cast.original_title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
cast.overview: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.
cast.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

cast.overview: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.
cast.title: Black Widow

details.biography: Stephen Samson was born on 16 June 1982 in Dundee, Tayside, Scotland, UK. He is an actor and director, known for Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom (2023), Karma Coma (2024) and Time Spent (2023)
details.name: Stephen Samson
